verses.verse: "Truly, <S%G281><s%> truly, <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, he who does not enter <S%G1525><s%> by the door <S%G2374><s%> into the fold <S%G833><s%> of the sheep, <S%G4263><s%> but climbs <S%G305><s%> up some <S%G237><s%> other <S%G237><s%> way, <S%G237><s%> he is a thief <S%G2812><s%> and a robber. <S%G3027><s%>
"But he who enters <S%G1525><s%> by the door <S%G2374><s%> is a shepherd <S%G4166><s%> of the sheep. <S%G4263><s%>

"To him the doorkeeper <S%G2377><s%> opens, <S%G455><s%> and the sheep <S%G4263><s%> hear <S%G191><s%> his voice, <S%G5456><s%> and he calls <S%G5455><s%> his own <S%G2398><s%> sheep <S%G4263><s%> by name, <S%G3686><s%> and leads <S%G1806><s%> them out.

"When <S%G3752><s%> he puts <S%G1544><s%> forth <S%G1544><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> his own, <S%G2398><s%> he goes <S%G4198><s%> before <S%G1715><s%> them, and the sheep <S%G4263><s%> follow <S%G190><s%> him because <S%G3754><s%> they know <S%G3609><s%> his voice. <S%G5456><s%>

"And a stranger <S%G245><s%> they simply will not follow, <S%G190><s%> but will flee <S%G5343><s%> from him, because <S%G3754><s%> they do not know <S%G3609><s%> the voice <S%G5456><s%> of strangers. <S%G245><s%>"

This <S%G3778><s%> figure <S%G3942><s%> of speech <S%G3942><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> spoke <S%G3004><s%> to them, but they did not understand <S%G1097><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> those things were which <S%G3739><s%> He had been saying <S%G2980><s%> to them.

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them again, <S%G3825><s%> "Truly, <S%G281><s%> truly, <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, I am <S%G1510><s%> the door <S%G2374><s%> of the sheep. <S%G4263><s%>
"All <S%G3956><s%> who <S%G3745><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> before <S%G4253><s%> Me are thieves <S%G2812><s%> and robbers, <S%G3027><s%> but the sheep <S%G4263><s%> did not hear <S%G191><s%> them.

"I am <S%G1510><s%> the door; <S%G2374><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> anyone <S%G5100><s%> enters <S%G1525><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> Me, he shall be saved, <S%G4982><s%> and shall go <S%G1525><s%> <S%G1831><s%> in and out, and find <S%G2147><s%> pasture. <S%G3542><s%>

"The thief <S%G2812><s%> comes <S%G2064><s%> only <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1487><s%> <S%G3361><s%> to steal, <S%G2813><s%> and kill, <S%G2380><s%> and destroy; <S%G622><s%> I came <S%G2064><s%> that they might have <S%G2192><s%> life, <S%G2222><s%> and might have <S%G2192><s%> [it] abundantly. <S%G4053><s%>

"I am <S%G1510><s%> the good <S%G2570><s%> shepherd; <S%G4166><s%> the good <S%G2570><s%> shepherd <S%G4166><s%> lays <S%G5087><s%> down <S%G5087><s%> His life <S%G5590><s%> for the sheep. <S%G4263><s%>

"He who is a hireling, <S%G3411><s%> and not a shepherd, <S%G4166><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> is not the owner <S%G2398><s%> of the sheep, <S%G4263><s%> beholds <S%G2334><s%> the wolf <S%G3074><s%> coming, <S%G2064><s%> and leaves <S%G863><s%> the sheep, <S%G4263><s%> and flees, <S%G5343><s%> and the wolf <S%G3074><s%> snatches <S%G726><s%> them, and scatters <S%G4650><s%> [them.]
["He flees] because <S%G3754><s%> he is a hireling, <S%G3411><s%> and is not concerned <S%G3199><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> the sheep. <S%G4263><s%>
"I am <S%G1510><s%> the good <S%G2570><s%> shepherd; <S%G4166><s%> and I know <S%G1097><s%> My own, <S%G1699><s%> and My own <S%G1699><s%> know <S%G1097><s%> Me,

even <S%G2531><s%> as the Father <S%G3962><s%> knows <S%G1097><s%> Me and I know <S%G1097><s%> the Father; <S%G3962><s%> and I lay <S%G5087><s%> down <S%G5087><s%> My life <S%G5590><s%> for the sheep. <S%G4263><s%>

"And I have <S%G2192><s%> other <S%G243><s%> sheep, <S%G4263><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> are not of this <S%G3778><s%> fold; <S%G833><s%> I must <S%G1163><s%> bring <S%G71><s%> them also, <S%G2548><s%> and they shall hear <S%G191><s%> My voice; <S%G5456><s%> and they shall become <S%G1096><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> flock <S%G4167><s%> [with] one <S%G1520><s%> shepherd. <S%G4166><s%>

"For this <S%G3778><s%> reason <S%G1223><s%> the Father <S%G3962><s%> loves <S%G25><s%> Me, because <S%G3754><s%> I lay <S%G5087><s%> down <S%G5087><s%> My life <S%G5590><s%> that I may take <S%G2983><s%> it again. <S%G3825><s%>

"No <S%G3762><s%> one <S%G3762><s%> has taken <S%G142><s%> it away <S%G142><s%> from Me, but I lay <S%G5087><s%> it down <S%G5087><s%> on My own <S%G1683><s%> initiative. <S%G1683><s%> I have <S%G2192><s%> authority <S%G1849><s%> to lay <S%G5087><s%> it down, <S%G5087><s%> and I have <S%G2192><s%> authority <S%G1849><s%> to take <S%G2983><s%> it up again. <S%G3825><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> commandment <S%G1785><s%> I received <S%G2983><s%> from My Father. <S%G3962><s%>"
There arose <S%G1096><s%> a division <S%G4978><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> the Jews <S%G2453><s%> because <S%G1223><s%> of these <S%G3778><s%> words. <S%G3056><s%>
And many <S%G4183><s%> of them were saying, <S%G3004><s%> "He has <S%G2192><s%> a demon <S%G1140><s%> and is insane. <S%G3105><s%> Why <S%G5101><s%> do you listen <S%G191><s%> to Him?"

Others <S%G243><s%> were saying, <S%G3004><s%> "These <S%G3778><s%> are not the sayings <S%G4487><s%> of one demon <S%G99999><s%> possessed. A demon cannot1410 3361 open455 the eyes3788 of the blind,5185 can he?"
At that time <S%G5119><s%> the Feast <S%G1456><s%> of the Dedication <S%G1456><s%> took <S%G1096><s%> place <S%G1096><s%> at Jerusalem; <S%G2414><s%>
it was winter, <S%G5494><s%> and Jesus <S%G2424><s%> was walking <S%G4043><s%> in the temple <S%G2413><s%> in the portico <S%G4745><s%> of Solomon. <S%G4672><s%>

The Jews <S%G2453><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> gathered <S%G2944><s%> around <S%G2944><s%> Him, and were saying <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "How <S%G2193><s%> long <S%G2193><s%> <S%G4219><s%> will You keep <S%G142><s%> us in suspense <S%G5590><s%> <S%G142><s%>? If <S%G1487><s%> You are the Christ, <S%G5547><s%> tell <S%G3004><s%> us plainly. <S%G3954><s%>"

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> them, "I told <S%G3004><s%> you, and you do not believe; <S%G4100><s%> the works <S%G2041><s%> that I do <S%G4160><s%> in My Father's name, <S%G3686><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> bear <S%G3140><s%> witness <S%G3140><s%> of Me.
" But you do not believe, <S%G4100><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> you are not of My sheep. <S%G4263><s%>
"My sheep <S%G4263><s%> hear <S%G191><s%> My voice, <S%G5456><s%> and I know <S%G1097><s%> them, and they follow <S%G190><s%> Me;

and I give <S%G1325><s%> eternal <S%G166><s%> life <S%G2222><s%> to them, and they shall never <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3361><s%> perish; <S%G622><s%> and no <S%G3756><s%> one <S%G5100><s%> shall snatch <S%G726><s%> them out of My hand. <S%G5495><s%>

"My Father, <S%G3962><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> has given <S%G1325><s%> [them] to Me, is greater <S%G3173><s%> than all; <S%G3956><s%> and no <S%G3762><s%> one <S%G3762><s%> is able <S%G1410><s%> to snatch <S%G726><s%> [them] out of the Father's hand. <S%G5495><s%>
" I and the Father <S%G3962><s%> are one. <S%G1520><s%>"
The Jews <S%G2453><s%> took <S%G941><s%> up stones <S%G3037><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> to stone <S%G3034><s%> Him.

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> them, "I showed <S%G1166><s%> you many <S%G4183><s%> good <S%G2570><s%> works <S%G2041><s%> from the Father; <S%G3962><s%> for which <S%G4169><s%> of them are you stoning <S%G3034><s%> Me?"

The Jews <S%G2453><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> Him, "For a good <S%G2570><s%> work <S%G2041><s%> we do not stone <S%G3034><s%> You, but for blasphemy; <S%G988><s%> and because <S%G3754><s%> You, being <S%G1510><s%> a man, <S%G444><s%> make <S%G4160><s%> Yourself <S%G4572><s%> out [to be] God. <S%G2316><s%>"
Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> them, "Has it not been <S%G1510><s%> written <S%G1125><s%> in your Law, <S%G3551><s%> 'I said, <S%G3004><s%> you are gods <S%G2316><s%>'?

"If <S%G1487><s%> he called <S%G3004><s%> them gods, <S%G2316><s%> to whom <S%G3739><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> came <S%G1096><s%> (and the Scripture <S%G1124><s%> cannot <S%G1410><s%> <S%G3756><s%> be broken <S%G3089><s%>),

do you say <S%G3004><s%> of Him, whom <S%G3739><s%> the Father <S%G3962><s%> sanctified <S%G37><s%> and sent <S%G649><s%> into the world, <S%G2889><s%>' You are blaspheming, <S%G987><s%>' because <S%G3754><s%> I said, <S%G3004><s%> 'I am <S%G1510><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>'?
"If <S%G1487><s%> I do not do <S%G4160><s%> the works <S%G2041><s%> of My Father, <S%G3962><s%> do not believe <S%G4100><s%> Me;

but if <S%G1487><s%> I do <S%G4160><s%> them, though <S%G2579><s%> you do not believe <S%G4100><s%> Me, believe <S%G4100><s%> the works, <S%G2041><s%> that you may know <S%G1097><s%> and understand <S%G1097><s%> that the Father <S%G3962><s%> is in Me, and I in the Father. <S%G3962><s%> "
Therefore <S%G3767><s%> they were seeking <S%G2212><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> to seize <S%G4084><s%> Him, and He eluded <S%G1831><s%> their grasp. <S%G5495><s%>

And He went <S%G565><s%> away <S%G565><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> beyond <S%G4008><s%> the Jordan <S%G2446><s%> to the place <S%G5117><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> was first <S%G4413><s%> baptizing, <S%G907><s%> and He was staying <S%G3306><s%> there. <S%G1563><s%>

And many <S%G4183><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> to Him and were saying, <S%G3004><s%> "While <S%G3303><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> performed <S%G4160><s%> no <S%G3762><s%> sign, <S%G4592><s%> yet <S%G1161><s%> everything <S%G3956><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> man <S%G3778><s%> was true. <S%G227><s%>"
And many <S%G4183><s%> believed <S%G4100><s%> in Him there. <S%G1563><s%>
